title: BRIEF-Group Five Says Sale Process For Creditor-Encumbered Subsidiary, Everite, Is Ongoing
text:
BRIEF-Group Five Says Sale Process For Creditor-Encumbered Subsidiary, Everite, Is Ongoing

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 11:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Group Five Says Sale Process For Creditor-Encumbered Subsidiary, Everite, Is Ongoing Oct 28 (Reuters) - Group Five Ltd : * MONTHLY UPDATE ON THE BUSINESS RESCUE PROCEEDINGS, DISPOSALS, POST COMMENCEMENT FINANCE AND BUSINESS RESCUE PLAN * SALE PROCESS FOR CREDITOR-ENCUMBERED SUBSIDIARY, EVERITE, IS ONGOING * SALE PROCESSES RELATED TO ITS SUBSIDIARY COMPANIES, OPERATING DIVISIONS, PROPERTIES AND/OR SHAREHOLDINGS REMAINS ON TRACK * CUMULATIVE PROCEEDS SINCE COMMENCEMENT OF BUSINESS RESCUE OF R2,3BN WILL BE REALISABLE FROM BINDING SALE AGREEMENTS ENTERED INTO TO DATE * GROSS CUMULATIVE PROCEEDS SINCE COMMENCEMENT OF BUSINESS RESCUE OF R2,3BN TO BE REALISED FROM BINDING SALE AGREEMENTS ENTERED INTO TO DATE

BRIEF-Group Five Says Sale Process For Creditor-Encumbered Subsidiary, Everite, Is Ongoing
description: BRIEF-Group Five Says Sale Process For Creditor-Encumbered Subsidiary, Everite, Is Ongoing
